text: Why not python implicit line continuation on period?
Is there any reason Python does not allow implicit line continuations after (or before) periods?

code:
data.where(lambda d: e.name == 'Obama').
    count()


data.where(lambda d: e.name == 'Obama')
    .count()

text: Does this conflict with some feature of Python?
With the rise of method chaining APIs this seems like a nice feature.
